api_list.name: logoutUser
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://petstore41.p.rapidapi.com/user/logout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "petstore41.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getOrderById
api_list.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generated exceptions

api_list.name: getInventory
api_list.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities
